name: Typography System From Material Design
description:
Trouble with Typography? I got you covered! I created this Typography System based upon the Material Design Course by Google. This is super useful because all the type elements are saved as components. So all you need to do is u have to do is drop the text elements into your file. It's that simple!

Check out the lesson here

https://material.io/design/typography/the-type-system.html#type-scale
